titleStmt.title: A proclamation adjourning the Parliament from the ninth day of September 1684, to the tenth day of March, 1685
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twenty fifth day of August, one thousand six hundred eighty and four years, and of Our Reign the thirtieth six year.
Signed: Colin McKenzie, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
